title: Kristen Stewart Wore a Spanx Dress on 'SNL' — Looked Amazing
text:
Kristen Stewart Wore a Spanx Dress on 'SNL' — Looked Amazing 
The girl is unpredictable. By Laurise McMillian Feb 5, 2017 Kristen Stewart is the queen of unpredictability (did you see her drop the f-bomb on stage?), so when we found out that she paired her $1,000+ Louboutin heels with a $78 Spanx slip dress on SNL last night, we weren't so much surprised as we were amazed. A photo posted by Tara Swennen (@taraswennen) on Feb 4, 2017 at 8:54pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Her stylist, Tara Swennen posted this photo on Instagram. The caption details KStew's opening look, "kristenstewart hosting @nbcsnl tonight in a @yvy.ch mesh skirt, @louboutinworld heels, a @spanx slip dress and @chanelofficial jewels! #kstew #snl#snlhost A HUGE #thankyou to the snl team!! #costumedept " More from ELLE:
